website_summaries.verdict: While it's affordable and made by a brand women have trusted for generations, it comes with some flaws that may frustrate some wearers.
pros: A good pick for consumers with sensitive skin, thanks to the fragrance and talc free formula
Better sun protection than competitors – SPF 19
Comes in a wide range of shades
cons: The jar and brush design doesn't do a good job preventing messes during use
Somewhat coarse texture is prone to caking
Color discrepancies have been reported – shades that are lighter or darker than indicated

customer_reviews.title: My favorite foundation
customer_reviews.text: I used to use bare minerals, that was my first powder foundation and I used to love it. However, as my skin aged it really settles in the fine lives and pores. But not this one. I'm not sure what the difference is, but I'm on my third order of true match mineral foundation and it does just what I need. It lasts all day without settling in every pore and looking cakey. The soft ivory shade is perfect for me, not to yellow or orange or pink, it evens out my fair blotchy skin tone.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I typically use Mary Kay's mineral powder, but I'll admit I was looking for a cheaper option. My biggest complaint about this was the brush. It was so coarse, I felt like it was scratching my face when I used it. It also spilled powder all over the place. I didn't even finish using this, I just went ahead and ordered Mary Kay again.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and use it every day. It isn't heavy like liquid foundation but covers imperfections well. It doesn't clog my pores and break out my skin. I'm very light skinned but the soft ivory made me look too pale. I find that the natural buff color works best for me. I usually moisturize every night and that helps with wearing powder makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene D.

customer_reviews.title: Color lighter than advertised. Packaging is horrible.
customer_reviews.text: Updated: Buff beige was a much better color for me but I just can’t get past the packing. It’s such a mess and wastes product even trying to dump it out into something else. It would be great if the manufacturer recreated the packaging. The color I ordered is way too light. Much lighter than it looked online, I look like a ghost. The powder seems decent but the package doesn’t work. You cannot use it the way it is. You need to dump the powder into something else. I will try it out with a darker color and see how it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, terrible packaging
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, terrible packaging. I just bought an empty foundation container to put the power into, and use a separate brush to go with it. Now I can fit it into my purse, too. Cost me extra $$$ though. The brush is attached to the lid so I can't use it for anything else, either. Oh well. But still recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Great powder
customer_reviews.text: Great mineral powder at a great price! It gives good, even coverage without looking chalky or cakey like many other powders. I'm pretty pale and I have a cool skintone (pink undertone) so a lot of products tend to look very orangey on me. I ordered the shade "soft ivory" and it matches very well, with no hint of orange. With this, I can usually skip the liquid foundation altogether, which is great because I hate wearing anything that feels heavy. I'm not a person who likes to spend a lot of time or money on makeup, so this is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, blends well. Much better than liquid foundation.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for years. I started out using BareMinerals but eventually switched to L’oreal brand once this type of makeup became more widely available. I love the powder and cannot even imagine going back to goopy liquid foundation. This blends well with my very light skin tone. It evens out my look without making me look “made up.” Its very natural looking.
customer_reviews.author: Trina

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite makeup of all time
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite makeup of all time. I have a difficult time finding this shade in my home town so I'm happy to be able to order it. The coverage is nice and natural looking. My skin is a bit oily and this really works wonders. I have terrible problems with makeup turning orange or pink or any number of other weird colors after a few hours but not with this. It blends in well and can be easily used with a concealer brush or even a small eyeshadow brush to cover blemishes. I love it and I have a friend hooked on it also.
customer_reviews.author: pinky

customer_reviews.title: BEST MINERAL MAKEUP
customer_reviews.text: I was having trouble finding this at stores. So grateful that is is here to purchase. I have not found anything that evens my skin tone so well without foundation or concealer. I like to go light on the makeup and this allows good coverage while looking natural. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy and Jonathan B.

customer_reviews.title: Okay coverage
customer_reviews.text: Nice light coverage only thing I don't like is the brush that comes with it is so hard and the bristles fall off. also it is not for older women tends to make my skin look very dried out and old.
customer_reviews.author: L. Ely

customer_reviews.title: The Best Make-Up!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best make-up I have ever tried! It is SO easy to put on and it makes my skin look amazing! The bottle is a pain though and it's really messy, so i cut out the plastic part inside and then dump it in a wider make-up container. The only thing I don't like about the actual make-up is that it does not wear well if I sweat. I play soccer and I need to make sure I take my make-up off before I play otherwise it starts running down my face. Gross. I use a mixture of Soft Ivory and Nude Beige in order to match my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Quigglers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite products. I've been using this for years.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey

customer_reviews.title: This smells like it has a strange chemical
customer_reviews.text: This smells like it has a strange chemical ... none that I have purchased at the local beauty store has EVER had any odor. This one smells like burnt plastic. I will NEVER buy this online again. More expensive at Ulta but theirs doesn't have that nasty smell :( Two thumbs WAY DOWN. The product, when bought elsewhere is AMAZING, Apply once in the morning stays all day without primer underneath, never clogs my pores, looks very natural compared to liquid foundations. Its a great product. I blame where it came from on the negative review,
customer_reviews.author: Becka C

customer_reviews.title: Best foundation powder out there!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite foundation powder! It covers up all my skin imperfections and gives me a very natural look! I am a customer for life!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: good for my pail skin
customer_reviews.text: i'm a red head and its hard to find colors that work. soft ivory is perfect. this absorbs oil but you have to reapply after several hours. settles into wrinkles too if you're worried about that. I do not use any other foundation under this products. does not cause breakout.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: MY FAVORITE MINERAL MAKEUP
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for years and I love the coverage. I tend to have very sensitive skin, cannot use anything with fragrance, and I have lots of redness which this covers beautifully and unlike liquid foundations it does not look oily or take on a orange color after a few hours of wear. It holds it's color very well, stays fresh looking much longer, and I would recommend it to anyone. I will say that mineral makeup is a bit dryer looking so if you have dry skin you may want to apply it directly over a moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: F. Huffman

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time finding my shade at the store. Sometimes I pay up to 16$ for one. This was a good deal!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Britt

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: The powder didn’t set well on my face and the brush was hard to use.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I've been using it for a long time. It's the most important part of my make-up routine for making my skin tone look even and for getting rid of shine. Easy to apply (although it does make a bit of a mess with the powder falling off the brush).
customer_reviews.author: boomersgang

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this powder for years, good coverage, doesnt feel heavy doesnt exacerbate my rosacea.
customer_reviews.author: mslittleone

customer_reviews.title: Great Colors & Easy Wear
customer_reviews.text: I have been using L’Oreal True Match for years. It is easy to apply and wears well. I use L’Oreal BB cream underneath, the powder does need something to stick to. I finish with setting powder on my tzone. If you do not have oily skin, setting powder will not be necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as the expensive mineral foundations - can't tell a difference
customer_reviews.text: I had to decrease my beauty budget, and unfortunately can't afford to spend 40 or 50 like I used to. I honestly don't see how this product is different than higher end mineral foundations that I've used. Perfect amount of medium coverage (use a flat brush to cover darker spots, like under your eyes), and doesn't look wrinkly or powdery. Matches my pale skin tone great, and evens out my freckles and flushed face. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My fave!! I feel all one color. It doesn't give over done powder look like some do. I am little older so I watch out for powders going in my lines, this doesn't do that.
customer_reviews.author: JBTX

customer_reviews.title: coverage is fantastic
customer_reviews.text: best powder ever, I don't have to use foundation and the soft ivory color is perfect for my skin tone. I use my own brush instead of the one that comes with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love this makeup. Easy and quick. Of course with any new makeup there is a trial and error on application. I found that the older the bristles on the brush the better. I use my old brush and product goes on easier and with more control. I Just wash brush with warm soapy water and let air dry completely. Try roughing up new brushes. I have sensitive skin. I wouldn't recommend for dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: S. Loria

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love the medium to full coverage of this product. I use a setting spray with it and it looks better than most liquid foundations.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie D Weglin

customer_reviews.title: My favorite powder
customer_reviews.text: My favorite loose powder, with a color that actually matched my extra fair skin. Very natural finish. I have used this for years and I have trouble finding it in stores, so I am very happy to find it on Amazon. No more driving from store to store.
customer_reviews.author: Jim D

customer_reviews.title: it covers but also in my opinion it looks cake like when
customer_reviews.text: this is a true foundation powder, it covers but also in my opinion it looks cake like when on
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Norman

customer_reviews.title: I love this powder!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this powder for a long time, I use it over my foundation to set and smooth. Loveeee ittt!!!
customer_reviews.author: Danni

customer_reviews.title: Odd tint and coverage
customer_reviews.text: This product was nothing like the brand you usually purchase in-store. It had a yellow tint that clashed with my skin tone. The powder seemed to clump together on my skin and melted fairly easily. I would recommend buying the actual L'Oreal True Match Mineral Foundation from a reputable store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this powder it felt and looked good on
customer_reviews.text: I love this powder it felt and looked good on. It lasted well too. The reason I only gave four stars is I had trouble getting the powder through the perffirations onto the brush. I had to dip the brush directly into the powder.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Good product, bad design.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be a great product for a touch up since the brush is incorporated with it. I was wrong. Because there is no way to close the powder holes when I open it the powder goes everywhere. Ok for home use but definitely not for touch ups.
customer_reviews.author: HR

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased this
customer_reviews.text: Glad I purchased this, great coverage and no heavy feeling. Doesn't feel like I have anything on my face. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Just Gets Everywhere
customer_reviews.text: When going to apply on the brush, the powder falls onto my pants and shirt almost every time. Other than that though, the product itself is really good quality. I have a very oily face, it stays on for most of the day. I re-apply later in the night time if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. Very light, yet it makes my skin look flawless. Will but again!
customer_reviews.author: Deidra Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Really like it
customer_reviews.text: Like this stuff a lot works as well as other more expensive mineral make up. Only down side is it does not come with a concealer brush. Great for travel since everything is together and it also not being a liquid. I was using pur and like this better. Probably just get their concealer with smaller brush
customer_reviews.author: mrsksince2004

customer_reviews.title: Color match was good (ivory) and coverage was OK
customer_reviews.text: This powder foundation just didn't work for me. Color match was good (ivory) and coverage was OK, however this product did nothing for my skin. Instead of giving me a smooth, matte finish, my face just looked dry and powdery. Not a good look. This foundation may be suitable for a finishing powder, but I can't use it as a foundation. Also, the brush it comes with is just too small to be effective.
customer_reviews.author: ukulelechick

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this foundation powder and have use it for years!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonMomma

customer_reviews.title: Use it everyday
customer_reviews.text: My favorite powder, wish they would bring back the concealer. Works well for pale people.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Forever a fan
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this product for as long as it's been around and I absolutely love it! Everyone has always complimented my makeup & it's because of this foundation. It's very effective for creating a smooth matte finish & covers pretty well. I use infallible pro matte foundation first and finish with this & It's the best combo, in my opinion. I have melasma, which creates dark splotches on my face from sun exposure, so being able to cover these areas is extremely important to me. This makeup fixes that issue right up! I will always use this product & I will buy from this seller because it's costs less than in a store! Kudos on that.
customer_reviews.author: ABT

customer_reviews.title: I liked this as much as any of the pricier mineral ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked this as much as any of the pricier mineral makeups I have purchased. Don't like the brush though, use my own brush for application.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Kate

customer_reviews.title: Too light for my skin tone but still a great buy
customer_reviews.text: very easy to apply if u order soft ivory it is perfect for fair skin.
customer_reviews.author: rose murray

customer_reviews.title: Warning: this is not the old Loreal bare minerals!
customer_reviews.text: Do not be duped by the photo! This is the new True Match White cap formula, which I don't like. It makes me break out and the grey cap never did. Amazon please change your product photo!
customer_reviews.author: average buyer

customer_reviews.title: Good product, poor container.
customer_reviews.text: It is a very nice product, but so hard to get the right amount on the brush. The packaging is awkward.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only thing I use on my face daily. Love it. Do not use foundation and my skin looks so smooth with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect quick and easy make up
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite makeup! It is quick, easy to apply and works great. Makes my skin tone even and does not feel heavy or make me break out.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable powder
customer_reviews.text: I love this powder. It has good coverage and goes on smoothly. I've been using it on and off for over 6 years.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: My go to powder doesn't cake on or clog my pores♡ been using it for years
customer_reviews.author: cara

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the attached brush and compact package. Easy to take with you and use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: A nice sized jar and a perfect color for a slightly tanned look. Nice applicator brush that is part of the jar = unique. Looks good. Nice price.
customer_reviews.author: Liz-ard

customer_reviews.title: L'Oreal wins another one!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for years and it always works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha R.

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for years, I love it. This product helped me so much. I have rosecia and vetiligo, covers everything.
customer_reviews.author: nana

customer_reviews.title: L'Oreal products are really good!
customer_reviews.text: Had to mix this with a darker shade to get the right color for me but it is a good product!
customer_reviews.author: dpk54

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite make up and I have tried all of the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite make up and I have tried all of the very expensive ones but this is the best
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Davis

customer_reviews.title: Dont Buy
customer_reviews.text: The brush on this is a joke. Plus it hurts my face!
customer_reviews.author: BKEM

customer_reviews.title: My favorite mineral powder!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for years now, and I love the product and consistency. The brush is decent, but for a disposable thing what do you expect? It offers great coverage, and doesn't make my skin break out. Biggest complaint (and reason for a 4 star review) is that I end up wasting a lot of product and making a mess, no matter how careful I am. I feel there could be a better application/ delivery system... But hasn't stopped me from being a loyal customer for years now. Comes in many shades as well!
customer_reviews.author: ladyluck

customer_reviews.title: Soft ivory...?
customer_reviews.text: ....more like soft orange. The lightest shade is darker in person and should not be used on pasty white chicks such as myself.
customer_reviews.author: Colie_Polie_Olie

customer_reviews.title: Love the ease of putting it on and gives such ...
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product for a few years. Love the ease of putting it on and gives such a smooth appearance. Also does not come off on your clothes/collars! That is important to me!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not best for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. Not best for dry skin. Not as good as bare minerals.
customer_reviews.author: leann craigo

customer_reviews.title: Covers well but does not control oil
customer_reviews.text: Medium buildable coverage. I love the color selection! The color fit me very well! It covered my acne but did not look cakey or feel heavy on my skin. It did not help control my oil though.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Peckham

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this mineral make up for a few years now and I still love it. Great coverage without making your face feel oily. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Zaida Bretz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with the color and fresh clean coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Have loved this foundation for years.
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that the Amazon product listin does not include the numbers for the color. I have always used that reference at the store to pick my best shade range. Without that I had a few misses on picking the proper color (too light, then too dark... and finally one that was my shade) but I mix them all up and it evens out. I am worried this product is being discontinued by L'Oreal as I cannot find it at the store anymore and Amazon only had limited colors. It is a great mineral/powder foundation at a great price... I would be sad to see it go away.
customer_reviews.author: FramFram Minnesotan

customer_reviews.title: Great foundation
customer_reviews.text: I had to order this mineral foundation online as the previous line has been withdrawn from our market and I have to say this new line is even better, the colour is just what I expected, the brush is perfect and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Judit Burkert

customer_reviews.title: Best Foundation Ever!
customer_reviews.text: My fave...can't live without it! Been using this for close to a decade (back when it was Bare Naturale) and I hope they never discontinue it! Airbrush effect.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly natural covrage!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this since it first hit the markets, and I will never go back to liquid foundation, concealor and powder. This is an all-in-one. It has light-as-air, buildable, BELIEVABLE coverage and a built in SPF. You can easily apply this in seconds with minimal blending needed. I love that this is not chalky looking in any way, it is very breathable. It does not dry out my very dry skin, and does not settle into pores or fine lines! Minerals are your skin's best friend!
customer_reviews.author: chrissy jaeger

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: So practical for everyday use! The result is also amazing. Too bad this product isn't sold at my country anymore..
customer_reviews.author: Ling Lie

customer_reviews.title: great foundation, no irratation
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this brand of mineral foundation for a while now-- I have very sensitive skin and have no problems. Also, I used to live in FL where it is super humid and generally only had to apply in the morning. It didn't "cake" up and gives a very nice matte finish. Just keep in mind, like me you may need to mix colors to get the perfect match (using the two colors allows me to adjust from the pale skin of winter to lightly tanned in the summer). I was thrilled to find it on Amazon and at a price that is better than my local store.
customer_reviews.author: K. Leal

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing this product for several years. I am 64yrs old. This product can go on sheer, or you can apply layers or more of it to cover imperfections on the face. I used to purchase a similar product that cost twice as much. I am very happy with this foundation and use the blush as well. Great value. I only wish I could purchase it without the brush, as I use my own. So, as a crafter, I have been saving the entire package after I use the powder, hoping once I have 30 or so, I can give to an art teacher for the kids to use with poster paint.
customer_reviews.author: Tyna L. Headrick-Phipps

customer_reviews.title: My all-time favorite
customer_reviews.text: Very convineint to have the brush included. I love this make-up. I can't feel it when it's on and it lasts all day without having to cake it on. As long as I wash it off at night it doesn't cause acne. I use an eyeshaddow applicator with this powder for spot coverage and it works great! I have oily skin but if I pair this with a light matte foundation I'm good to go. I usually use it on it's own though. Would give more stars if I could. I just bought 3 because I can't find them is stores anymore. One of these will last me 6+ months and I use it every single day.
customer_reviews.author: ngbooks

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: I don't love this. It really clings to dry patches that for someone who slathers on squalene and oils, I don't believe exist. I swear this clogs my teenager skin. L'oreal has some real winners but this isn't one of them for me. I wanted light-medium coverage that isnt foundation-y (meaning less time to apply). I've found true love with makeup revolution, maybe you will find it there too.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Awful packaging, great coverage
customer_reviews.text: The packaging on this is absolutely awful. It's so difficult to get the product out and on to the brush! That said, once you're able to finagle it, the coverage is incredible. I use this on top of a color correcting cream as I have some redness, and it's a great combo.
customer_reviews.author: Giraffe

customer_reviews.title: Love how well it conceals with looking natural!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this powder since high school and love it. It conceals very well and is very blendable. My only complaint is I think it may make me break out a little. I do get oily throughout the day so I will use oil blotting sheets and will reapply a little bit to help me stay looking fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Kels

customer_reviews.title: Looks Pretty - but.....
customer_reviews.text: It looks very pretty and the brush is very nice... however... it is messy to use and a continual process to load the brush with additional powder.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage!
customer_reviews.text: Got this product after TheMakeUpChair from Youtube kept raving about it. It doesn't disappoint. I usually use liquid foundations so this was a big change for me. However, I don't substitute this as my new base foundation. I use it over my liquid foundation as a powder and I love it because it sets really well and adds more coverage. Love it and will continue to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Kcsteta

customer_reviews.title: l Love This Mineral Makeup
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this brand since it was introduced many years ago. Although I've tried many other brands I find myself always returning to the L'Oreal brand. The powder is very soft, blends well, and doesn't settle in "wisdom lines" (aka wrinkles). It is very light and doesn't leave a "masky" feel once applied. The fact that it is offered as a subscription is fantastic as the price is less expensive than purchasing it in stores. I'm looking forward to receiving my next shipment!
customer_reviews.author: mskellic

customer_reviews.title: Love this mineral power!
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorites. Good coverage and stays on all day!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Bettter than any other Mineral Foundation, and cheaper too.
customer_reviews.text: This is every bit as good as Bare Minerals, or any other Mineral Foundation. Better than Clinique's, which I found didn't last all day. This stuff lasts all day, doesn't "melt" at the end of the day, and never looks cakey or fake. Bonus that it comes with a brush. Even better that it's cheaper than most of the other stuff. L'Oreal's got me as a customer for life.
customer_reviews.author: stefany9579

customer_reviews.title: My favorite mineral foundation
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a lot of different foundations/mineral powders, but this one is my favorite. It really helps even out my skin tone. I don't have any major acne or blemishes, so I can't speak for covering up those. But if you want a nice even toned face, this works great. It also makes my face feel very soft, and is easy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: megalodon

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I used bare minerals for a long time and this is completely comparable. My only complaint is the bottle design. It is a pain in the butt!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Provides a natural look
customer_reviews.text: I don't wear mineral powder very often, and only apply it once, usually when I might be getting my picture taken. I hate foundation, but I like a finished look. This product is perfect for those purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Lanier

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite powder foundation
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite powder foundation. Easy to apply, good coverage, wears well, and looks great. And a terrific value because it’s half the price of other powder foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Elizabeth Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: First time trying and I have oily skin, this stuff is great.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. G

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: Pros Good color, soft and blends well with skin with no clumps or powdery look. Cons Powder pours out and difficult to control amount, so usually waste some powder with each use I gave 4 stars till I use it for some time to be able to tell if truly mineral and doesn't cause allergy as I'm severely allergic
customer_reviews.author: nevine

customer_reviews.title: I get this over and over and may move to autoship - love it
customer_reviews.text: I get this over and over because this shade has become hard to find anywhere and getting it from Amazon this way is the most convenient way to make sure I won't run out ever. I swear by this product. Recommend not using the brush though - you will end up with nose and lungs full of mineral foundation. Use a powder puff.
customer_reviews.author: KrunchyKitten

customer_reviews.title: This is the best! You can build coverage from light to full
customer_reviews.text: I've tried all kinds of mineral powder foundation, including prestige brands. This is the best! You can build coverage from light to full. I use it as a concealer too by using a small pointed brush and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah E

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It does hide the redness really well on my face and isn't very heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Good shade for fair skinned women
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my fair skinned daughter. We mixed it with a little bit of zinc oxide powder and she uses it as makeup but also sunscreen. She plays soccer and it seems to stay on during games. We'll see how well it does when it gets hotter!
customer_reviews.author: buster

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t my everyday foundation. I mainly use this as sunscreen while out at lunch or as a re-touch during the day. I like that it is all-in-one unit. It is easy to use and the color works for me. I like that it fits into my make-up bag and I can travel with it. I will buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Natural looking
customer_reviews.text: Whenever I wear this withunderneath, I always get compliments on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Name Witheld

customer_reviews.title: Great product, terrible packaging
customer_reviews.text: I do like the foundation, but getting every last bit out of the container is tough.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Jasso

customer_reviews.title: The only powder foundation I've found that you can layer ...
customer_reviews.text: The only powder foundation I've found that you can layer concealer on top with no issue. Will forever buy this product!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Burdett

customer_reviews.title: This product is great and covers everything but expect a mess
customer_reviews.text: I'm very white and picky on what I put on my skin. This product is great and covers everything but expect a mess!
customer_reviews.author: jillian culver

customer_reviews.title: GOOD
customer_reviews.text: It is "heavier" than I like but is good. I just have to take more time to even it out. What I do like it that it does work well over the "sudden change" serum. So I give it an A+
customer_reviews.author: JKC

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this mineral powder, it feels like cream after a few minutes
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: easy to make a mess
customer_reviews.text: Works well but it is easy to spill and make a mess i end up with powder on my sink around where i am using it and on my shirt
customer_reviews.author: TrillWill

customer_reviews.title: Finally a match for my pale skin!
customer_reviews.text: Amazon is the only place I can find this color. If you have very pale skin, this matches perfectly! It has great coverage and lasts all day. Price is right too.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Great at covering anything red!
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the only products i found that didn't cake or make you look fake and plastic. It matches with your natural complexion and covers all zits, pimples, or anything red and noticeable. The shipping was also on time and packaged very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: NicoleNicole

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as Bareminerals but pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Very light but I use it under my eyes for dark circles.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Not What I Thought It Would Be
customer_reviews.text: I thought this product would be similar to the Bare Escentuals makeup line, but it doesn't cover or match my skind the way theirs does.
customer_reviews.author: SGZ

product_meta.title: L'Oreal Paris True Match Mineral Loose Powder Foundation, Soft Ivory, 0.35oz
product_meta.description: Discover the feeling of skin breathing freely. True Match Naturale re-invents makeup with carefully selected, 100% preservative-, talc- and fragrance-free minerals plus built-in professional brushes. This skin-improving mineral formula with SPF 19 covers flawlessly, leaves your skin soft and your tone even. It’s gentle. It’s minerals.
feature_bullets: TRUE MATCH POWDER FOUNDATION WITH SPF: This skin-improving mineral formula with SPF 19 covers flawlessly, leaves your skin soft, & your tone even. Delivers natural but radiant, flawless coverage for up to 16 hours.
TRUE MATCH FACE MAKEUP delivers natural-looking, easily blendable color. Everything from the True Match foundation to the blush offers shades that can match your skin tone for true-to-you coverage.

THE FOUNDATION OF YOUR LOOK: From BB creams to blush, L'Oréal face makeup has everything you need. Highlight to illuminate your look, use concealer to hide imperfections or apply contouring makeup for enhanced, defined features.

BECAUSE YOU'RE WORTH IT: L'Oréal Paris helps you create the look you want with our full line of makeup including foundations, concealers, highlighter makeup, eyeshadow palettes, lipsticks & much more.
PERFECT TO PAIR WITH True Match Super-Blendable Concealer, which precisely matches your skin’s tone & texture & coordinates perfectly with True Match Makeup, Powder, & Blush.
